channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem for Associação Mutualista Montepio, 7–11 July 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 21.1–26.4%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 34.4–40.3%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 7.4–10.9%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 5.1–8.1%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 5.4–8.6%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 3.2–5.7%
  • Aliança (*): 0.9–2.4%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã and Negócios, 13–19 June 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 4–6 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 7–9 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 1–2 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Aliança (*): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã and Negócios, 13–19 June 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã and Negócios, 13–19 June 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 20.0–26.7%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 31.8–39.4%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 6.9–11.5%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 4.9–8.9%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 5.2–9.3%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 2.8–6.0%
  • Aliança (*): 0.4–1.9%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem, 2–6 June 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 5–6 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 8–10 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 1 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 1 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 0–1 seats
  • Aliança (*): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem, 2–6 June 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem, 2–6 June 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 21.7–26.9%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 34.5–40.4%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 7.5–11.1%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 4.7–7.7%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 5.0–8.0%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (Greens/EFA): 3.7–6.4%
  • Aliança (*): 1.2–2.9%
